Section.name: About Adhiyamaan College of Engineering
Section.description:
Adhiyamaan College of Engineering, Hosur, Tamil Nadu is a private institute established in the year 1987-1988. The institute is affiliated to Anna University Chennai and offers UG and PG courses such as BE/B. Tech, B.Arch, ME/M.Tech, MBA, and MCA. The institute has excellent infrastructure spread over 250 acres of land and is NAAC B++ accredited. The institute offers courses in different streams such as Engineering, IT and Software, Business and Management, and Architecture and Planning.
For admissions to UG courses such as B.Arch, candidates have to appear for the NATA. Similarly, admissions to BE/B.Tech courses are based upon TNEA counselling.
Admissions to PG courses such as MBA, MCA, ME/M.Tech are provided on the basis of candidate’s score in TANCET entrance exam.
The institute offers Under Graduates and Post Graduates Courses which are available in the below mentioned table with the eligibility criteria of each course. Without passing the given eligibility, the candidate will not be able to appear in the exam conducted for the admission process.

The institute provides placement facilities to its deserving candidates. Some of the top recruiting companies visiting the campus are Amazon, Aditya Birla Group, Berger Paints, CapGemini, Birla Sun Life, IBM any many more. The institute conducts various placement activities such as Personality Development, Group Discussion, Mock Interviews and Aptitude Tests which aims to help the students in facing the challenging interviews from various companies/industries.

The institute has well-experienced faculty members. Some of the most prominent faculties of the institute are as follows:
Ques. What is the nearest landmark of the institute?
Ans. The nearest landmark of the institute is Dr Mgr Nagar Opposite Ashok Leyland.
Ques. Does college provide any medical facility inside the campus?
Ans. Yes, the college has their own medical faculty department. The college organised various camps for the physical and mental health of their students.
Ques. What are the facilities that the institute provides?
Ans. The institute provides Hostel Facilities, Library, Laboratory, Playgrounds, Canteen, Gym, Medical Facilities, Auditorium and Scholarship Facilities to their students.
Ques. Is the institute a co-educational institute?
Ans. Yes, the institute is a co-educational institute.
Ques. When was the institute established?
Ans. The institute was established in 1987 and approved by AICTE New Delhi.
